    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import (
    5:     Index,
    6:     MultiIndex,
    7: )
    8: 
    9: 
   10: # Note: identical the "multi" entry in the top-level "index" fixture
   11: @pytest.fixture
   12: def idx():
   13:     # a MultiIndex used to test the general functionality of the
   14:     # general functionality of this object
   15:     major_axis = Index(["foo", "bar", "baz", "qux"])
   16:     minor_axis = Index(["one", "two"])
   17: 
   18:     major_codes = np.array([0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 3])
   19:     minor_codes = np.array([0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1])
   20:     index_names = ["first", "second"]
   21:     mi = MultiIndex(
   22:         levels=[major_axis, minor_axis],
   23:         codes=[major_codes, minor_codes],
   24:         names=index_names,
   25:         verify_integrity=False,
   26:     )
   27:     return mi
